channel.title: Alignment?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Alignment?" - Alignment Options can be handy.

item.title: Alignment?
item.content:encoded:
I noticed, there isn't Any Alignment Options for on here.
like "Left" "Center" "Right", & "Justified"

I just find it annoying that Tables automaticly Center themselves on the page.
Take my BvSWiki profile for instance
http://bvswiki.com/player:kurinobito

The tables are automaticly Centered, which makes the page seem ugly looking.
If we had the option to change the alignment of things, that coule be prevented.

I wish my Tables were aligned left >.<
